feature.name: Alternate Form: Flames
feature.description: Spend a standard action to take on a body of pure flame.

subpowers.name: Lighter than Air
subpowers.description: Being made of flame, you can fly.

subpowers.name: Made of Energy
subpowers.description: Being made of flame, you are unaffected by certain kinds of attacks.

EXAMPLE.name: Alternate Form: Flames
EXAMPLE.description: Spend a standard action to take on a body of pure flame

feature.name: Alternate Form: Gaseous
feature.description: Spend a standard action to turn into a cloud of gas, like fog or mist.

subpowers.name: Suffocate
subpowers.description: By surrounding your foe, you can cut off their breath.

subpowers.name: Difficult to See
subpowers.description: As a semi-transparent gas, your form is difficult to see. You have partial concealment from all visual senses.

subpowers.name: Inaudible
subpowers.description: As a gas, you do not make any noise at all.

subpowers.name: Lighter than Air
subpowers.description: Being made of gas, you can fly.

subpowers.name: Made of Gas
subpowers.description: Being made of gas, immune to physical damage, except for area attacks. You can also flow through any opening that is not airtight.

EXAMPLE.name: Alternate Form: Flames
EXAMPLE.description: Spend a standard action to take on a body of pure flame

feature.name: Blast
feature.description: You can make a damaging ranged attack. It might be a blast of energy, a projectile (arrow, bullet, throwing blade, etc.), or some similar effect.

feature.name: Dazzle
feature.description: You can overwhelm one of the target's senses, chosen when you take this effect. The target makes a Fortitude or Will resistance check against your effect DC (choose one when you acquire the effect). One degree of failure leaves the sense impaired (–2 penalty). Two degrees leave it disabled (–5 penalty) while three degrees leave the sense unaware (the target automatically fails Perception checks involving the sense, and everything effectively has total concealment from that sense).

feature.name: Duplication
feature.description: You can create a duplicate of yourself. Your duplicate is a minion with the same traits as you, except for this power and any effort points.

feature.name: Element Control
feature.description: You have the ability to move around some specific element (earth, air, water, etc).

feature.name: Energy Absorption to Strength
feature.description: When hit with any kinetic force, gain +ranks of strength which then fades at one rank per turn. You still take damage normally.

feature.name: Energy Aura
feature.description: You can surround your body with an aura of damaging energy or some similar effect. Anyone you touch or that touches you must make a Toughness resistance check against your aura’s Damage rank. You can turn your aura on and off at will as a free action.

feature.name: Energy Control: Cold
feature.description: You can generate and project cold in a damaging blast.

subpowers.name: Freezing Damage
subpowers.description: The frigid cold of the blast does some damage.

subpowers.name: Trap in Ice
subpowers.description: Target gets trapped in a shell of ice, preventing them from moving.

feature.name: Energy Control: Magnetism
feature.description: You can damage people with magnetic blasts, and can also use them to move metalic objects.

subpowers.name: Magnetic Force Blast
subpowers.description: Magnetic force does some damage to living creatures due to the iron in their blood.

subpowers.name: Move with Magnetic Force
subpowers.description: Metal objects can be moved around and potentially damaged with powerful magnetic forces.

feature.name: Force Field
feature.description: You can surround your body with a protective field of energy or force, providing you with a Toughness increase equal to your rank.

feature.name: Invisibility
feature.description: For two ranks, you can vanish from sight at will, gaining total visual concealment, although other senses can still detect you.

feature.name: Magic Blast
feature.description: You are a sorcerer, witch, or wizard, your basic default effect is a Blast of eldritch force, able to inflict Ranged Damage.

feature.name: Mental Blast
feature.description: You can strike targets' minds with "mental force," inflicting Damage resisted by the target's Will rather than Toughness, but having no effect on targets immune to effects resisted by Will, such as inanimate objects. This version is difficult to detect with normal senses.

feature.name: Mimic
feature.description: You can duplicate the traits of another character you can perceive, requiring a move action to scan them. You gain (Mimic rank x 5) power points worth of traits the target has, up to a maximum of the target's rank, and limited by the total power points you can Mimic.

feature.name: Mind Control
feature.description: You can impose your will on others, forcing them to obey your commands. Targets failing a Will resistance check against your effect DC first become dazed, then compelled, as they try to fight off your influence. Finally, with three or more degrees of effect, the target becomes controlled and obeys any commands you give.

feature.name: Power-Lifting
feature.description: Your lifting and carrying capacity is out of proportion with the rest of your Strength. Each rank in this power gives you +1 to your Strength rank for determining how much weight you can lift and carry, but does not increase your Strength damage or other effects of your Strength rank.

feature.name: Shapeshift
feature.description: You can transform into different forms, gaining the physical traits (abilities, skills, advantages, and powers) of the assumed form. You gain (Shapeshift rank x 5) power points worth of traits. You can also redistribute points spent on your own physical traits (lowering your Strength to apply those points elsewhere, for example). You are limited to the inherent traits of the forms you assume and do not gain new mental traits, even if that form possesses them.

feature.name: Sleep
feature.description: You cause the target to feel tremendous weariness. Targets failing the Fortitude resistance check against your effect DC become fatigued, then exhausted, and finally asleep as they succumb.

feature.name: Snare
feature.description: You can restrain a target with bonds of ice, glue, webbing, bands of energy, and so forth (whatever suits your descriptors). The target makes a Dodge resistance check against your effect DC. One degree of failure leaves the target hindered and vulnerable, while two results in the target becoming defenseless and immobilized. The resistance check to break out of a Snare is based on Damage (including Strength Damage) or Sleight of Hand, either breaking the effect or slipping out of it.

flaws.optionName: Limited to two degrees of effect

feature.name: Strike: Strength-Based
feature.description: You inflict additional damage in close combat. Your Strike adds to your Strength damage. It might be claws, focused striking strength, or something similar, depending on your descriptors.

feature.name: Strike: Powered
feature.description: You inflict damage in close combat. Your Strike adds to your Strength damage. It might be energy fields, a powerful taser, or something similar, depending on your descriptors.

feature.name: Suffocation
feature.description: You render the target unable to breathe. Targets failing the Fortitude resistance check against your effect DC become dazed, stunned, and finally incapacitated, passing out from the lack of oxygen. A failed attempt to resist the ongoing effect of Suffocation causes the target's condition to worsen by one degree. It is resisted by Fortitude.

feature.name: Super-Speed
feature.description: You are fast! Each rank of Super-Speed gives you the effects of Improved Initiative as an Enhanced Trait, Quickness, and Speed, with a ground speed rank equal to your power rank.

subpowers.name: Quick Reactions
subpowers.description: Your super-speed reactions let you get the jump on others.

subpowers.name: Quick Actions
subpowers.description: You can apply your super-speed to complete routine tasks rapidly.
